comments.body: Is the return type correct as nodemailer.Transport? It seems like in your implementation(https://github.com/orliesaurus/nodemailer-mailgun-transport/blob/master/src/mailgun-transport.js), I dont see close method thats required in nodemailer.Transport (https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/nodemailer/index.d.ts#L210)

I was checking other definitions of nodemailer plugins and they all return Transport which is input parameter of nodemailer.createTransport method (https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/nodemailer/index.d.ts#L77) and this function then returns type Transporter. Not sure why Transport.close() is marked as mandatory method because it looks like it's needed only for SMTP-transport; SES and JSON transports (https://github.com/nodemailer/nodemailer/blob/master/lib/ses-transport/index.js, https://github.com/nodemailer/nodemailer/blob/master/lib/json-transport/index.js) doesn't have them either.
